queyu_utils.common.file module¶

queyu_utils.common.file.ensure_dir(file_path)¶

Ensure the existence of the directory of file_path to prevent some ‘No such file or directory’ errors.

Parameters

file_path (str) – Target file path.

queyu_utils.common.file.read_json(json_file_path)¶

Read JSON file more conveniently.

Parameters

Return type

Any

Returns

JSON object.
